content:
I just had one of those epiphany moments where something just 'clicked' in my mind, so I wrote it down hoping others will understand it better too: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/1954#issuecomment-701864768

How to work out which config file a config option is in? 路 Issue #1954 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
In converting a theme from Drupal to Backdrop, I had to convert variable_get() to config_get(). However config_get() requires you to know which config file the variable/config option is stored in. ...

A user in the forum has a question about the performance impact of config calls. Is anyone able to answer their questions?
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/configstorageinterfaceread-settings
I've responded, but someone with more insight should chime in.
